text: Scandal, Vol. 1 is the fourth studio album by Norwegian singer-songwriter Marion Raven, following the international release of her album Songs from a Blackbird released earlier this year in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. Scandal Vol. 1 will be released in Norway on September 22, 2014 on iTunes and CD, and "Scandal Vol. 2" with eight more songs is expected to be released in January 2015.
title: Scandal Vol. 1
